subject: Re: extension request on org.junit.internal.MethodSorter
msgSnippet: An idea about how to arrange sorting when the runner is built with a sort request. So if a user specifies a sorting method using a request, then the method
messageBody:
An idea about how to arrange sorting when the runner is built with a sort request.
So if a user specifies a sorting method using a request, then the method will have the highest priority. That means it will override the sorting method defined by @SortWith annotation. Otherwise the sorting method will be implemented according to what defined in the @SortWith annotation.

Cheers,
Sien
